author: davidsheffield
body:
The ScoutingMuon members `nMatchedStations_` and `type_` are needed for when we add tracker muons.

I created new `plugin` directories in `HLTrigger/Egamma` and `HLTrigger/Muon` to match the scouting jet producers in `HLTrigger/JetMET`. Let me know if the producers should be placed in the existing `src` directory.
title: Add scouting electron, photon, and muon classes and producers
